types:type.name: Flight
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Flight = Array<{| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDate: String, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane: {| "type": String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"ID\\\":1,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/26\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"CLE\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}},{\\\"ID\\\":2,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER45if\\\",\\\"price\\\":540.99,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/27\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"ORD\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":54,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 777\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":300}}]"}
